name: unssbd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))
stmt.pretty: sylibr(w0, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆ c1), (c2 ⋃ c0)⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))
-| wb(wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))
-| wb(wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cun(c2, c0), c1))

comment: If ` ( A u. B ) ` is contained in ` C ` , so is ` B ` . One-way deduction form of ~ unss . Partial converse of ~ unssd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
